code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     DefaultCamelContext context = (DefaultCamelContext) super.createCamelContext().     context.init().     // START SNIPPET: e1     // add event notifier where we can log the times it took to process     // exchanges sent to an endpoint     context.getManagementStrategy().addEventNotifier(new MyLoggingSentEventNotifer()).     return context. }

@Test public void testExchangeSent() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to("direct:bar").to("mock:result").     from("direct:bar").delay(1000). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("direct:bar").to("mock:result").             from("direct:bar").delay(1000).         }     }. }
